description: The tender for the Request for Information is to seek input on the Linguisic Services Request Management System and is not a formal Call for Tenders. The Request for Information and Schedule of Requirements are to be downloaded from the Government e-Sourcing (GC) website. The request from the requesting agency is to know more about already existing solutions available in the  market for a Language Service Request Management System. The task to be perform this project via: a. To Identify what is the current state of the functionality and technology available for a Linguistic Service Request Management System Solution. In particular for the translation memory software b. To Determine if there is an existing commercial off the shelf (COTS) product that will be able to meet a majority of non-technical and technical requirements for a solution c. To assess the potential development cost and time required to fully meet the requirement if there is not an existing COTS product that meets the majority of the requirement. d. To Refine planning and cost estimates. the required bid includes software for translation memory build solely as a trade-off alternate.

### Linguistic Services Request Management System (LSRMS)
#### Request for Information

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking feedback on a proposed Linguistic Services Request Management System (LSRMS) to streamline translation and linguistic services.

#### Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 100026030
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-14
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-28T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category A)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Trade Status**: Expiré (Expired)

#### Purpose

The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to gather insights on the current state of technology and commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) products available for a LSRMS solution, with specific focus on translation memory software.

#### Required Information

* Information on existing COTS products that meet a majority of the non-technical and technical requirements for a solution
* Development costs and timelines required for a customized solution
* Refined planning and cost estimates for a potential LSRMS solution

#### Contact Information
* Melissa Proulx, NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca, 819

#### Supporting Documents
* Amendment #1 [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33985/100026030-rfi-lsrms-amd1-v1e_0.pdf)
* Request for Information [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33985/100026030-rfi-lsrms-v1e.pdf)
